attributes.action: stop Furness academy and save our schools and teachers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not want an academy. Save Parkview, Thorncliffe, and Alfred Barrow!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop Furness academy and save our schools and teachers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20331


Prime Minister's Office
